author: Robert Mammone
description:
You probably don’t know Cullen Bunn as the author of the upcoming Bones of Our Stars, Blood of Our World. But he may be familiar to you from his extensive comics writing CV that points to an outstanding work ethic, and fertile imagination.  He has worked for publishers as diverse as Oni Press (The Sixth […]

The post REVIEW: Bones of Our Stars, Blood of Our World by Cullen Bunn appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Bones of Our Stars, Blood of Our World by Cullen Bunn
